title: 320. Q&AF: Paying Yourself, Instilling Mental Toughness In Your Child & Opportunities At Work
itunes:title: 320. Q&AF: Paying Yourself, Instilling Mental Toughness In Your Child & Opportunities At Work
description: In today's episode, Andy answers your questions on when it's an appropriate time to pay yourself after reinvesting into your business, what's the best way to instill mental toughness & discipline in your child, and how to find the positive opportunities within a new company.
content:encoded: In today's episode, Andy answers your questions on when it's an appropriate time to pay yourself after reinvesting into your business, what's the best way to instill mental toughness & discipline in your child, and how to find the positive opportunities within a new company.
